name: BSOTD040
description:
Shattered screen, no backlight, under bright light.

I am a professional laptop refurbisher, and I make art using broken computers.  This is a series of 100 NFTs over 100 days, all broken screens, all 1/1!  I don’t know if this will be successful, but I’m inspired by the idea of working on art daily in order to build momentum.  I have shelves of broken screens I have collected, so this will be a way to force myself to photograph them.

To provide context for the images, I will occasionally post ancillary photos of the broken devices involved on Twitter (@rdklinc).  I will mint on a daily basis and at a random time.  

I generally avoid apps and effects, using only minor color correction, and I often put my own photography behind the broken screens to bring out the colors.  Please see my Instagram (@rdklinc) for a more comprehensive collection of my work.
